price: “(Arafata) imana (zacu) zose akazigira Imana imwe? Mu by’ukuri, iki ni ikintu gitangaje!”
arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ajaʿala al-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidan inna hādhā lashayon ʿujābun
